title: Anyone ID this type?
content:
Today is World Aids Day and I was wondering if anyone knows what font did they use for the (RED) campaign.

Thank you.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023161538im_/http:/typophile.com/files/n6829493713_1107_4752.jpg)
author: RJClouse

comments.content: Yep, Alternate Gothic (there are quite a few styles) or something else associated with Morris Fuller Benton perhaps...?
